entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow early this morning and with periods of drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
